capabilities.description: Nginx Proxy Manager requires this ability to switch user for sub-processes.
capabilities.name: SETUID

capabilities.description: Nginx Proxy Manager requires this ability to switch group for sub-processes.
capabilities.name: SETGID

capabilities.description: Nginx Proxy Manager requires this ability to chown files.
capabilities.name: CHOWN

capabilities.description: Nginx Proxy Manager requires this ability to bypass file ownership checks for it's sub-processes.
capabilities.name: FOWNER

capabilities.description: Nginx Proxy Manager requires this ability to bypass file permission checks for it's sub-processes.
capabilities.name: DAC_OVERRIDE
